text: Alan Tudor Blaikley (23 March 1940 â€“ 4 July 2022) was an English songwriter and composer. He was best known for writing the UK number one singles "Have I the Right?" and "The Legend of Xanadu".Entry under Howard & Blaikley in The Penguin Encyclopaedia of Popular Music (1989) He also wrote the theme music for the BBC's long-running series of Agatha Christie's Miss Marple. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English composers Category:English songwriters Category:Writers from London
title: Alan Blaikley
